data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Sühbaatar to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sühbaatar, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 197 believers in Sühbaatar to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 115 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Sühbaatar. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Sühbaatar that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Deaf people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Sühbaatar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 197 believers in Sühbaatar.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Sühbaatar, Mongolia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

location.name: Sühbaatar
location.people_groups_list: Mongol, Khalka, Kalmyk-Oirat, Khoton, Uzbek, Northern, Kazakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mongol, Khalka (2,297,000), Kalmyk-Oirat (261,000), Khoton (13,000), Uzbek, Northern (26,000), Kazakh (116,000)
